    • Method Detail

      • exit

        public abstract void exit(boolean ignorePlatformRestrictions)
        Exits the game
        Parameters:
        ignorePlatformRestrictions - exit even if platform rules don't permit exiting programmatically. Should be used only for debug purposes and always set to false for release builds.
